name: GP Challenge
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

GP Challenge puts you in the driver's seat of cars that can top 160mph!
Four exhilarating courses await you. Can you gain control over the opposition and record a race time that professional drivers would be proud of?

Fully 3D graphics and blistering Artificial Intelligence make for an exciting white-knuckle race for the finish line!
